definition: to shut up; by implication, to surrender
kjvTranslation: stop, give over. See also H5462 (סָגַר), H7936 (שָׂכַר).

translations.bg: да затворя; по подразбиране - да се предам
translations.da: at lukke af; underforstået at overgive sig
translations.el: να κλείσω, να παραδώσω, με την έννοια ότι παραδίδομαι
translations.fr: se taire ; par implication, se rendre
translations.id: untuk tutup mulut; dengan implikasi, untuk menyerah
translations.ja: 黙らせる；暗に降伏させる
translations.nb: å stenge igjen; underforstått, å overgi seg
translations.ro: a închide; implicit, a se preda
translations.sv: att hålla tyst; underförstått, att ge upp
